txt.en: 'Hello, my friend. We have discovered an Ekhamâti camp where they are storing siege engines. We must destroy these machines of war before they can be used against us. I ask for your help with this and please eliminate any Ekhamâti soldiers who try and stop you.'
Your mission is to sabotage siege engines that have been discovered in a nearby Ekhamâti camp and eliminate any soldiers that try and stop you.
There is no twist in this mission.
'You have returned! I have been informed of your great success in sabotaging the siege engines and thinning the Ekhamâti ranks. Please take this for all you have done.'
Your mission is to sabotage siege engines that have been discovered in a nearby Ekhamâti camp and eliminate any soldiers that try and stop you.

Your mission is to sabotage siege engines that have been discovered in a nearby Ekhamâti camp and eliminate any soldiers that try and stop you.\n\nSpeak to Setokúli to travel.
